#Text=The Boston Celtics ( 22 - 33 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 10 - 46 ) 115 - 94 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston .
#Text=While they were down 49 - 48 at half , the Celtics took off in the second half , out - scoring the Knicks 67 - 45 to finish the game .

#Text=The Celtics used their superior shooting to to gain an advantage , as they went 51 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks finished at just 42 percent from the floor and a meager 10 percent from deep .
#Text=The Celtics also out - rebounded the Knicks 46 - 41 , only helping to further their lead .
#Text=The Celtics saw a huge contribution from their bench , including their three leading scorers .
#Text=Isaiah Thomas was one of those players , as he finished with 19 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 11 - 11 FT ) , six rebounds and seven assists in 27 minutes .
#Text=He 's played extremely well for Boston , averaging 20 points and 5 assists in the three games since coming over from Phoenix .
#Text=Jae Crowder was another one of those bench contributors , posting 18 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and six rebounds in 28 minutes .
#Text=He 's really started to come on for the Celtics , combining to score 52 points , while grabbing 20 rebounds over his last three games .
#Text=The third strong performance from the bench was to recently acquired Jonas Jerebko .
#Text=In just 20 minutes , he went 7 - for - 10 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 20 points .
#Text=It marked a new season - high for the forward , as it was far - and - away his most productive performance on the season .
#Text=Marcus Smart had a strong showing with the starters as well , posting 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and four assists .

#Text=The Knicks were led by Andrea Bargnani , who came off the Knicks ' bench to score 17 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 7 - 9 FT ) , while also adding six rebounds and two blocked shots in 25 minutes .
#Text=Playing in just his seventh game of the season due to injury , it was easily his strongest showing to this point .
#Text=The Knicks also received a nice effort from Jason Smith , who finished with 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) and 10 rebounds .
#Text=It marked just his third double - double of the season .
#Text=Scoring 14 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) of his own , Langston Galloway continued to stay one of the Knicks more consistent players of late .
#Text=Over his last three games he 's averaging 15 points , the best stretch of any other Knicks ' player .
#Text=Lou Amundson added an efficient 14 points as well , going 6 - for - 8 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the free throw line .
#Text=The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Knicks will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
